H0.text: Name the head of the 'whistleblowing' website Wikileaks, in the news during 2010 after publishing thousands of sensitive government and military documents. Daniel Ellsberg

H1.text: Name the head of the 'whistleblowing' website Wikileaks, in the news during 2010 after publishing thousands of sensitive government and military documents. Birgitta Jónsdóttir

H2.text: Name the head of the 'whistleblowing' website Wikileaks, in the news during 2010 after publishing thousands of sensitive government and military documents. Jacob Appelbaum

H3.text: Name the head of the 'whistleblowing' website Wikileaks, in the news during 2010 after publishing thousands of sensitive government and military documents. Assange

A4.text: Julian Paul Assange is an Australian editor, publisher, and activist who founded WikiLeaks in 2006.

A5.text: The Guardian wrote that the decision to publish the cables was made by Assange alone.
